test_message: Generate today's meal plan for a 67kg male focused on shredding fat and gaining muscle. Preferred meal times: Breakfast 8AM, Mid-morning snack 11AM, Lunch 1PM, Evening snack 5PM, Dinner 8PM. I prefer easy-prep Indian non-veg options like eggs, chicken, paneer, fish. Minimal cooking skills.

meals.prep_instructions: Boil 4 eggs for 8-10 minutes. Serve warm eggs with a glass of milk. Minimal prep required.

food_items: 1 scoop whey protein (with water or milk)
meals.prep_instructions: Add 1 scoop whey protein to water or milk, shake well, and drink immediately. Super quick prep.
Grill 150g chicken breast with salt/spices in a pan. Cook 1 cup dal in a pressure cooker. Quick and easy meal.
Scramble 100g paneer with chopped onions & tomatoes, sprinkle basic spices, and cook on a nonstick pan. Ready in 10 min.
Cook 120g fish with minimal oil, water, and curry spices. Use pressure cooker or shallow pan. Serve hot with optional veggies.

result.summary: High-protein easy Indian non-veg meal plan for shredding and muscle gain. You will consume about 145g protein split across 5 simple meals, meeting and slightly exceeding your target for optimal muscle retention. All meals are scheduled with calendar reminders and require minimal cooking skills.
